Ian is a Master of Environmental Data Science graduate of the UCSB Bren School, where he applied statistical modeling, geospatial analysis, and data engineering workflows to understand ecological change in coastal and marine systems. His work integrates R, Python, and cloud-based analytics to build reproducible tools that support conservation planning, environmental monitoring, and data-driven decision making.
